name: support-alert-system
description: A support alert system with Node.js server and React dashboard

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../functions && npm install
scripts.deploy: npm run build:client && npm run build:functions && npx firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build:client && npx firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run build:functions && npx firebase deploy --only functions
